trans-unit.source: Represents literal data that can appear as the value for a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> node.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以显示为的值的文本数据<xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref>节点。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XData.Text%2A> is the XAML content property for XData.
To read values from out of a XAML node stream where `XData` is returned, get the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XData.Text%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 从中读取值抽取 XAML 节点流 where`XData`是返回，获取<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XData.Text%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XData.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Encoding considerations are declared at top-level XML, and are generally UTF-8 by default.
trans-unit.target: 编码注意事项在顶级 XML 声明并通常 utf-8 默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XData"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the literal value string that this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XData"></xref> wraps.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本值字符串，这<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XData"></xref>包装。

trans-unit.source: Text is the XAML content property for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XData>.
trans-unit.target: 文本是<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XData>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XData>的 XAML 内容属性

trans-unit.source: To read values from out of a XAML node stream where `XData` is returned, get the Text property value.
trans-unit.target: 从中读取值抽取 XAML 节点流 where`XData`是返回，获取文本属性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reader for the literal data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本数据的读取器。

trans-unit.source: If no reader is previously set for `XData`, calling the get accessor creates a new <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: 如果无读卡器以前设置的`XData`，调用了 get 访问器创建一个新<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>为此目的。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The type of this property is <xref:System.Object> rather than <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> in order to provide an optimization pathway for callers that do not want to include the `System.Xml` assembly just for the base type definitions, and who will be using the default reader.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的类型是<xref:System.Object>而非<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>以便为不希望包括的调用方提供优化途径`System.Xml`不仅仅用于的基类型定义，和谁将使用默认读取器的程序集。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A reader for the literal data.
